verbose_text: In order to examine IPL organization in vivo, we used the Tg (Isl2b : Gal4; UAS : Kaede) transgenic zebrafish line (see Experimental Procedures), where the fluorescent protein Kaede is expressed in the majority of RGCs.
evidence: Isl2b:Gal4;UAS:Kaede) transgenic zebrafish line (see Experimental Procedures), where the fluorescent protein Kaede is expressed
